name: 1.0 PRELIMINARIES - Prior To Commencement of Work – Master Worklot Records (if applicable)
Specification Reference - JH-MPR-SQE-006 Managing SQE Risks
Acceptance Criteria - All ‘pre-construction’ authorisations and checks completed and recorded in Pre-Commencement Checklist in PPW as part of the AMS establishment
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Prior to works commencing
Specification Reference - NWP-000-NWA-PRO-XQA-0003 - Work Lot Management Procedure
Acceptance Criteria - Work Lot Map attached to Work Lot
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Per work lot
2.0 MATERIAL COMPLIANCE - Prior To Commencement of Work – Master Worklot Records (if applicable)
Acceptance Criteria - Confirm that external equipment calibration and testing facilities are registered in PPW.
○ External equipment calibration meets contract requirements for each item of test equipment.
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Visual check with certificates, ITP, checklist or inspection report
Acceptance Criteria - Mechanical shop drawings have been reviewed and approved by NWPA
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Prior to works commencing
All preliminary records have been reviewed and approved. ITP signed at sections 1 to 3 and uploaded to Master lot with all preliminary records. Works may proceed onsite.
4.0 CONSTRUCTION ACTIVITIES - Prior To Commencement and During Works – Sub-lot Records (if applicable)
○ All mechanical Units – ERV, AC, DX, IEC, fans etc.
Acceptance Criteria - Materials conform to IFC drawings and Specifications
○ Qty conform to purchase order requirements
○ Free of defects, transportation damage and/or imperfections
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Visual check with written notes in Delivery docket, ITP, checklist or inspection report.
Acceptance Criteria - All pipe work and duct work has been installed as per design specifications and relevant standards
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - As per each equipment
5.0 TESTING AND COMMISSIONING REQUIREMENTS – Post Construction Works – Sub-lot Records (if applicable)
Acceptance Criteria - Pressure testing should be in accordance with the design specifications and relevant standards
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - As per each air conduiting unit
Acceptance Criteria - Mechanical systems are tested to perform in accordance with the design specifications and relevant standards
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - As per each equipment
6.0 COMPLETION REQUIREMENTS – Post Construction Works – Sub-lot Records (if applicable)
Specification Reference - NWP-000-NWA-PRO-XDC-0002 – Outstanding Works, Works Completion and Defect Management Procedure
Acceptance Criteria - Works completed in accordance with IFC Dwg and Specifications
○ Inspection completed & recorded prior to releasing activity
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Visual Inspection with Subcontractor at the end of work activity prior to signing off ITP
Inspection: Project Team Sign Date - Refer to CHK241
Specification Reference - NWP-000-NWA-PLN-XPM-0022 Quality Management Plan
Acceptance Criteria - All out of tolerances notified via NCR reporting system
○ All NCR’s applicable to the works to be raised in a timely manner and, if applicable, designer confirmation to be obtained.
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Prior to closing and signing ITP
Inspection: Project Team Sign Date - Refer to CHK241
Specification Reference - NWP-000-NWA-PLN-XPM-0006 Design and Engineering Management Plan
Acceptance Criteria - Design/Construction Queries or clarifications relating to this ITP are addressed and closed.
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - DCNs and RFIs closed and linked to NCRs where applicable
Inspection: Project Team Sign Date - Refer to CHK241
Specification Reference - NWP-000-NWA-GUD-XDM-0002 Red Line Guidelines
Acceptance Criteria - Redline drawing to be produced & maintained by engineers to include all changes made during construction
○ Redline to use latest IFC version of the design drawings and be marked- up in red pen, to identify any variations
○ RFI, DCR, ECW and Client Wavers to be referenced in redlines (as required)
Test / Inspection Method & Frequency - Completion of Works
Inspection: Project Team Sign Date - Refer to CHK241
